# init(bitCount:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new key size of the given length.

## Declaration

```swift
init(bitCount: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **bitCount**: The number of bits in the key size.

## Discussion

In most cases, you can use one of the standard key sizes, like bits256. If instead you need a key with a non-standard size, use the [doc://com.apple.CryptoKit/documentation/CryptoKit/SymmetricKeySize/init(bitCount:)] initializer to create a custom key size.
title: init(bitCount:)
